bibl.title: Albert Rhude v. Hotaling Company of Puget Sound. Answer of Sheriff
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

keywords.term: James Seavey James Ludlow J.H. McGraw

person.persName: A.P. Hotaling Company of Puget Sound

div1.ab: Territory of Washington County of King | ss.
div1.p: J.H. McGraw being duly sworn deposes and says that he is the respondent mentioned in the ongoing return: that he has has the same knew the entitled thereof and believes it to be true.
div1.ab: Subscribed and sworn to before me this 10th dat of November 1884.
Sheriffs' Fees Bringing deft before Court 1.00 Copy of warrant .80 Travel .20 Certificate .50 ______ $2.50
In re application of Albert Rhude for Writ of Habeas Corpus
Filed Nov 10 1884 James Seavey Ckerk. By James P Ludlow Deputy Clerk.
